channel.title: Bots spotted!
channel.description:
It appears RSBot and Nexus have both been beta testing their bots. I was lucky enough to find some while messing around on runescape on my phone.
I attacked one of the 5 people (each had the same generic name) and they kept attacking the hill giant, paying no mind to me. Just eating as they lost health.
I guess RSBot (powerbot) has even set a release deadline for December 6th. I wll do some testing with that :)

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:54, topic:423477”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526115.msg3834468#msg3834468 date=1322788437]

If you don’t want to play the game then why do you… play? I really hope bots don’t come back. I expect JaGeX to have had multiple backup plans and strategies, or at least it would of been arrogant to not. The question I guess now is who can create solutions faster…

I enjoy rolling around level 130 with legit armor while I only have to do quest, because that’s my favorite part of Runescape.
[/quote]

How can you be level 130 if you don’t have an account?

[quote author=ox random xi link=topic=443860.msg3834575#msg3834575 date=1322792629]
I wish I had a damn account.
[/quote][/quote]
I was replying to the

The Wanderer:

If you don’t want to play the game then why do you… play? I really hope bots don’t come back. I expect JaGeX to have had multiple backup plans and strategies, or at least it would of been arrogant to not. The question I guess now is who can create solutions faster…

Read full topic

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:44, topic:423477”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=526115.msg3833415#msg3833415 date=1322718858]

Just some news, RSBot (aka powerbot) has finished the code for a working bot. Jagex is delaying the release of the bot with a lawsuit. Too bad powerbot is china based huh?

Tragic

Now that rsbuddy is gone though, I don’t think a outbreak like before the bot nuke would happen again…

Thought if nexus comes back, that’d be awesome, would be nice to get slayer to like 85 or so
Would get a lot of charms and cash doing it + exp
[/quote]
thats what we said when aryan was killed.[/quote]
True, I somewhat remember aryan…

inb4 aryanbuddy?

Read full topic

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:39, topic:423477”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=526115.msg3833327#msg3833327 date=1322714658]

I found a bot called RID (Robots I Disguise) and it requires logging in and sorts. I thing I am going to crack this so it things you have an unlimited amount of credits. The decompile process is taking quite a while but I hope it will be worth it. I have read some good things about this bot but I do not care to spend money to use it. Anybody else need a copy if I get it cracked?

hehe, just found out about that?

Yeah, sucks it requires credits, I’d love a copy if you can get it to work :D, really don’t want to pay so much for it :o
[/quote]
Yea, the fact it requires credits is just horrid. There are cracked copies online but I never see something good come from youtube if its cracked.[/quote]
Lol

goodluck nonetheless

Read full topic

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Yeah all the rsbuddy kids are all still like panicking i bet, when I keep telling them to visit villavu, their response “OMFG NO MOAR BOT CLINT FUK U MEN JAGEX MEN”

Only tell them because they think that if its not RiD, rsbuddy, rsbot or powerbot, it doesn’t exist… and its annoying, though they probably couldnt even get SMART set up, let alone simba, because it requires a small amount of thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:33, topic:423477”][quote author=Tree link=topic=526115.msg3833277#msg3833277 date=1322712062]
One or two private bots solved the problem within a week. There will always be work-arounds. Silab’s OpenGL idea has potential as well. Honestly though, it would do the scene good if everyone just went back to Simba.
[/quote]
I use simba

Sometimes

Yeah I talked about silabs opengl bot on the first page, has lots of potential, if it goes through, would it actually be run by us? Or?..[/quote]

Back in the old times, everyone used to contribute with SCAR. Huge tutorials were posted and all of that. It was just such a friendly atmosphere. Nobody expected payment for anything (few exceptions). Now it’s all based around cash.

Well like most things, it would be developed in private. Then the developers would let little bits out. ‘Feed the community’ with examples or brags. People would then use what they could gather and create some shitty imitation which would then become the new big thing.

What’s public here, is the left-overs from projects greater. There’s also the possibility that someone will develop something like that and use it to bring in money. So you end up with either:

a) a shitty imitation
or
b) an overpriced pile of rubbish

Read full topic

item.title: Bots spotted!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:29, topic:423477”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=526115.msg3833187#msg3833187 date=1322708532]

[quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=526115.msg3833179#msg3833179 date=1322707943]

Look how long its taken them to get bots working, once they finally do, jagex will scramble their shit again and break them for another month, i think this is how they are going to combat the mainstream bots

They’re only, like, 3 mainstream bots right now.
[/quote]There are…

But the bots will be broken, and I should probably refund my auths.

I thought you only had like only 1 day after purchase to refund?

Doesnt mean you cant charge back.

45 days or less?

If not, can someone tell me how, me watns to charges back :o
[/quote]I thought you could return anytime. I’m most likely wrong

There is a time set on when you can return, after that it’s void.[/quote]I could charge back on paypal claiming the product was no longer working after so and so days.

Read full topic
